dialogue: The error message says my copy of Windows is not genuine.
I'll walk you through a series of steps that won't work.
After seventeen attempts that involve rebooting, you will lose hope.
At some point you will give up and buy a new computer just to be done with it all.
We'll start by uninstalling all of your drivers and reinstalling.
Can I skip all of the useless steps and just buy a new computer?
Sure, but you don't need to be a jerk about it.
